name: Vegan White Sandwich Bread Recipe
description: Easy White Sandwich Bread to make grilled sandwiches. Vegan Soy-free corn-free Palm oil free Recipe. can be made nut-free
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup warm almond milk  (or other non dairy milk)
3 cups organic bread flour (or all purpose flour or unbleached white flour (See notes section for 100% whole wheat bread))

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, proof the yeast by mixing warm water, sugar and yeast. Let sit for 5 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, proof the yeast by mixing warm water, sugar and yeast. Let sit for 5 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, add the dry ingredients and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, add the dry ingredients and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the yeast mixture, oil and warm almond milk and knead for 8 minutes into a soft smooth non sticky dough.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the yeast mixture, oil and warm almond milk and knead for 8 minutes into a soft smooth non sticky dough.

recipeInstructions.text: Use more water or flour if needed. I added another Tablespoon water. It will depend on the consistency of the non dairy milk and if you used sugar or maple syrup.
recipeInstructions.name: Use more water or flour if needed. I added another Tablespoon water. It will depend on the consistency of the non dairy milk and if you used sugar or maple syrup.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the bowl with a towel and let rise for 1.5 hours or until doubled.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover the bowl with a towel and let rise for 1.5 hours or until doubled.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the dough out, punch it down and shape into a loaf, by rolling into a jelly roll or pulling on all sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the dough out, punch it down and shape into a loaf, by rolling into a jelly roll or pulling on all sides.

recipeInstructions.text: Place in a greased or parchment lined bread pan. Spray water on top and then spray oil or dust with flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Place in a greased or parchment lined bread pan. Spray water on top and then spray oil or dust with flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover lightly with a towel and let rise until doubled. 30-40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover lightly with a towel and let rise until doubled. 30-40 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in pre-heated 370 degrees F / 190ºc for 35-40 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in pre-heated 370 degrees F / 190ºc for 35-40 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the bread from pan. Cool completely before slicing.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the bread from pan. Cool completely before slicing.
